<ul class="list-course">
  <!-- FOR EACH COURSE -->
  <li class="list-course-space-item">
    <div class="list-course-space-gradient-top"></div>
    <div class="list-course-space-header">
      <div class="list-course-space-authoring">
        <h3>
          <a class="list-course-space-link icon-course-lightblue_32_34-before" href="COURSE_LINK" title="COURSE_NAME">COURSE_NAME</a>
        </h3>
        <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_HOURS -->
        <h6 class="list-course-hours">COURSE_HOURS</h6>
        <!-- END -->
        <span class="legend">autor:</span>
        <a class="link-name icon-teacher-gray_16_18-before" href="COURSE_AUTHOR_LINK" title="COURSE_AUTHOR_NAME">COURSE_AUTHOR_NAME</a>
      </div>
      <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_ANY_NOTICE -->
      <div class="list-course-space-labels">
        <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_ANY_NEW_NOTICES --><span class="label-news" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_NOTICES_AMOUNT novos avisos">NEW_NOTICES_AMOUNT</span><!-- END --><!-- IF COURSE_HAS_ANY_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="label-doubts" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT novos pedidos de ajuda">NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT</span><!-- END -->
      </div>
      <!-- END -->
    </div>
    <div class="list-course-space-stats">
      <span class="list-course-stat icon-space-gray_16_18-before">COURSE_SPACES_AMOUNT disciplinas</span><span class="list-course-stat icon-teacher-gray_16_18-before">COURSE_TEACHERS_AMOUNT professores</span><span class="list-course-stat icon-tutor-gray_16_18-before">COURSE_TUTORS_AMOUNT tutores</span><span class="list-course-stat icon-member-gray_16_18-before">COURSE_MEMBERS_AMOUNT alunos</span>
    </div>
    <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_DESCRIPTION -->
    <p class="list-course-space-description icon-description-gray_16_18-before" title="Descrição">COURSE_DESCRIPTION</p>
    <!-- END -->
    <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_TAGS -->
    <p class="list-course-space-tags icon-tag-gray_16_18-before" title="Palavras-chaves">COURSE_TAGS_COMMA_SEPARATED</p>
    <!-- END -->
    <!-- IF COURSE_IS_PRIVATE -->
    <span class="list-course-private icon-private-gray_16_18" rel="tooltip" title="Curso privado">Curso privado</span>
    <!-- END -->
    <div class="list-course-space-gradient-bottom"></div>
  </li>
  <!-- END -->
</ul>

<ul class="list-space">
  <!-- FOR EACH SPACE -->
  <li class="list-course-space-item">
    <div class="list-course-space-gradient-top"></div>
    <div class="list-course-space-header icon-course-lightgray_32_34-before">
      <div class="list-course-space-authoring">
        <h3>
          <a class="list-course-space-link icon-space-lightblue_32_34-before" href="SPACE_LINK" title="SPACE_NAME">SPACE_NAME</a>
        </h3>
        <span class="legend">autor: </span><a class="link-name icon-teacher-gray_16_18-before" href="SPACE_AUTHOR_LINK" title="SPACE_AUTHOR_NAME">SPACE_AUTHOR_NAME</a>
      </div>
      <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_ANY_NOTICE -->
      <div class="list-course-space-labels">
        <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_ANY_NEWS --><span class="label-news" rel="tooltip" title="(NEW_SUBJECTS_AMOUNT + NEW_WALL_MESSAGES_AMOUNT + NEW_WALL_REPLIES_AMOUNT + NEW_FILES_AMOUNT) novos avisos">(NEW_SUBJECTS_AMOUNT + NEW_WALL_MESSAGES_AMOUNT + NEW_WALL_REPLIES_AMOUNT + NEW_FILES_AMOUNT)</span><!-- END --><!-- IF SPACE_HAS_ANY_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="label-doubts" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT novos pedidos de ajuda">NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT</span>
        <!-- END -->
      </div>
      <!-- END -->
    </div>
    <div class="list-course-space-stats">
      <div class="list-space-stats-row">
        <span class="list-space-stat"><a href="SPACE_SUBJECTS_LINK" class="icon-subject-lightblue_16_18-before" title="Aulas">Aulas:</a> SPACE_SUBJECTS_AMOUNT <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_NEW_SUBJECTS --><span class="list-space-stats-blue" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_SUBJECTS_AMOUNT novas aulas">(+NEW_SUBJECTS_AMOUNT)</span><!-- END --></span><span class="list-space-stat icon-request-help-lightorange_16_18-before">SPACE_DOUBTS_AMOUNT pedidos de ajuda <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="list-space-stats-orange" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT novos pedidos de ajuda">(+NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT)</span><!-- END --></span>
      </div>
      <div class="list-space-stats-row">
        <span class="list-space-stat"><a href="SPACE_WALL_LINK" class="icon-wall-lightblue_16_18-before" title="Mural da disciplina">Mural da disciplina:</a> SPACE_WALL_MESSAGES_AMOUNT conversas <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_NEW_WALL_MESSAGES --><span class="list-space-stats-blue" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_WALL_MESSAGES_AMOUNT novas conversas">(+NEW_WALL_MESSAGES_AMOUNT)</span><!-- END --></span><span class="list-space-stat icon-reply-lightblue_16_18-before">SPACE_WALL_REPLIES_AMOUNT respostas <span class="list-space-stats-blue" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_WALL_REPLIES_AMOUNT novas respostas">(+NEW_WALL_REPLIES_AMOUNT)</span></span>
      </div>
      <div class="list-space-stats-row">
        <span class="list-space-stat"><a href="SPACE_FILES_LINK" class="icon-file-lightblue_16_18-before" title="Arquivos de apoio">Arquivos de apoio:</a> SPACE_FILES_AMOUNT arquivos <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_NEW_FILES --><span class="list-space-stats-blue" rel="tooltip" title="NEW_FILES_AMOUNT novos arquivos">(+NEW_FILES_AMOUNT)</span><!-- END --></span>
      </div>
    </div>
    <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_DESCRIPTION -->
    <p class="list-course-space-description icon-description-gray_16_18-before" title="Descrição">SPACE_DESCRIPTION</p>
    <!-- END -->
    <!-- IF SPACE_HAS_TAGS -->
    <p class="list-course-space-tags icon-tag-gray_16_18-before" title="Palavras-chaves">SPACE_TAGS_COMMA_SEPARATED</p>
    <!-- END -->
    <div class="list-course-space-gradient-bottom"></div>
  </li>
  <!-- END -->
</ul>

<ul class="list-subject">
  <!-- FOR EACH SUBJECT -->
  <li class="list-subject-item">
    <div class="list-subject-header">
      <h4 class="list-subject-name">SUBJECT_NAME</h4>
      <div class="list-subject-header-info">
        <!-- IF SUBJECT_HAS_ANY_NEW_NOTICES --><span class="label-news" rel="tooltip" title="LECTURES_NEW_NOTICES_SUM novos avisos">LECTURES_NEW_NOTICES_SUM</span><!-- END --><!-- IF LECTURE_HAS_ANY_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="label-doubts" rel="tooltip" title="LECTURES_NEW_DOUBTS_SUM novos pedidos de ajuda">LECTURES_NEW_DOUBTS_SUM</span><!-- END --><div class="progress-bar-mini progress-bar-total" rel="tooltip" title="SUBJECT_COMPLETITION_PERCENTAGE% cursado">
          <div class="progress-bar-completed" style="width: SUBJECT_COMPLETITION_PERCENTAGE%;">SUBJECT_COMPLETITION_PERCENTAGE% cursado</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="list-subject-body">
      <!-- IF SUBJECT_HAS_DESCRIPTION -->
      <p class="list-subject-description icon-description-gray_16_18-before" title="Descrição">SUBJECT_DESCRIPTION</p>
      <!-- END -->
      <!-- IF SUBJECT_HAS_LECTURES -->
      <ol class="list-button">
        <!-- FOR EACH LECTURE -->
        <li class="list-button-item link-container">
          <!-- CHOOSE ICON DEPENDING LECTURE TYPE -->
          <a class="list-button-link link-target icon-(text-page|presentation|exercise|video)-lightblue_16_18-before" href="LECTURE_LINK" title="LECTURE_NAME">LECTURE_NAME</a>
          <div class="list-lecture-info">
            <!-- IF LECTURE_IS_NEW --><span class="label-news" rel="tooltip" title="Nova aula">Novo</span><!-- END --><!-- IF LECTURE_IS_COMPLETED --><span class="icon-correct-green_8_10 text-replacement" rel="tooltip" title="Aula completada">Aula completada</span><!-- END --><!-- IF LECTURE_HAS_NEW_NOTICES --><span class="wall-stats-new icon-wall-lightblue_16_18-before" rel="tooltip" title="LECTURE_NOTICES_AMOUNT avisos<br />LECTURE_NEW_NOTICES_AMOUNT novos avisos">+LECTURE_NEW_NOTICES_AMOUNT</span><!-- ELSE --><span class="wall-stats icon-wall-gray_16_18-before" rel="tooltip" title="LECTURE_NOTICES_AMOUNT avisos">LECTURE_NOTICES_AMOUNT</span><!-- END --><!-- IF LECTURE_HAS_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="request-help-stats-new icon-request-help-lightorange_16_18-before" rel="tooltip" title="LECTURE_DOUBTS_AMOUNT pedidos de ajuda<br />LECTURE_NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT novos pedidos">+LECTURE_NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT</span><!-- ELSE --><span class="request-help-stats icon-request-help-gray_16_18-before" rel="tooltip" title="LECTURE_DOUBTS_AMOUNT pedidos de ajuda">LECTURE_DOUBTS_AMOUNT</span><!-- END --><span class="stars"><!-- PRINT AS MUCH FULL STARS AS LECTURE_RATE AND COMPLETE WITH EMPTY STARS TILL 5 --><span class="star icon-star-full-gray_8_10"></span><span class="star icon-star-full-gray_8_10"></span><span class="star icon-star-full-gray_8_10"></span><span class="star icon-star-full-gray_8_10"></span><span class="star icon-star-empty-gray_8_10"><!-- END --></span>
            </span>
          </div>
        </li>
        <!-- END -->
      </ol>
      <!-- END -->
    </div>
  </li>
  <!-- END -->
</ul>

<ul class="list-environment-course-space">
  <!-- FOR EACH ENVIRONMENT -->
  <li class="list-environment-course-space-item">
    <div class="list-environment-course-space-header">
      <a class="list-environment-course-space-image-link" href="ENVIRONMENT_LINK" title="ENVIRONMENT_NAME">
        <img src="ENVIRONMENT_IMAGE_LINK" alt="ENVIRONMENT_NAME" title="ENVIRONMENT_NAME" width="32" height="32" />
      </a>
      <h4 class="list-environment-course-space-title">
        <a class="list-environment-course-space-link" href="ENVIRONMENT_LINK" title="ENVIRONMENT_NAME">ENVIRONMENT_NAME</a>
      </h4>
    </div>
    <!-- IF ENVIRONMENT_HAS_COURSE -->
    <ul class="list-mix">
      <!-- FOR EACH COURSE -->
      <li class="icon-course-lightgray_32_34-before">
        <div class="list-mix-item">
          <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_SPACE -->
          <button class="button-default button-dropdown">
          <!-- ELSE -->
          <button class="button-default button-disabled button-dropdown">
          <!-- END -->
            <span class="icon-arrow-down-lightblue_8_10 show"></span>
          </button>
          <div class="list-mix-content">
            <div class="list-mix-header">
              <h5"><a class="list-mix-title" href="COURSE_LINK" title="COURSE_NAME">COURSE_NAME</a></h5>
              <span class="legend">COURSE_SPACE_AMOUNT disciplinas</span>
            </div>
            <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_SPACE -->
            <ul class="list-mix-body list-space-mini">
              <!-- FOR EACH SPACE -->
              <li>
                <a href="SPACE_LINK" class="icon-space-lightblue_16_18-before" title="SPACE_NAME">SPACE_NAME</a><!-- IF SPACE_HAS_NEW_NOTICES --><span class="label-news" rel="tooltip" title="SPACE_NEW_NOTICES_AMOUNT novos avisos">SPACE_NEW_NOTICES_AMOUNT</span><!-- END --><!-- IF SPACE_HAS_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="label-doubts" rel="tooltip" title="SPACE_NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT novos pedidos de ajuda">SPACE_NEW_DOUBTS_AMOUNT</span><!-- END -->
              </li>
              <!-- END -->
            </ul>
            <!-- END -->
          </div>
          <div class="list-mix-info">
            <!-- IF COURSE_HAS_ANY_NEW_NOTICES --><span class="label-news" rel="tooltip" title="SPACE_NEW_NOTICES_SUM_AMOUNT novos avisos">SPACE_NEW_NOTICES_SUM_AMOUNT</span><!-- END --><!-- IF COURSE_HAS_ANY_NEW_DOUBTS --><span class="label-doubts" rel="tooltip" title="SPACE_NEW_DOUBTS_SUM_AMOUNT novos pedidos de ajuda">SPACE_NEW_DOUBTS_SUM_AMOUNT</span><!-- END -->
          </div>
        </div>
      </li>
      <!-- END -->
    </ul>
    <!-- END -->
  </li>
  <!-- END -->
</ul>

Lista-botão

Usado pela lista de módulos e aulas.

Depende do bootstrap-list.js para executar o comportamento de que quando um item da lista é clicado, o usuário é redirecionado para a URL do âncora com a classe list-button-link.

  • This is the list's hyperlink
  • This is the list's hyperlink 
<ul class="list-button">
  <!-- FOR EACH LIST ITEM -->
  <li class="list-button-item link-container">
    <a href="ITEM_LINK" title="ITEM_NAME" class="list-button-link link-target">ITEM_NAME</a>
  </li>
  <!-- END -->
</ul>

Lista mista (botão e lista)

Usado pela lista de ambientes-cursos-disciplinas.

Depende do bootstrap-list.js para executar o comportamento de que quando o botão dropdown de um item da lista é clicado, o bloco de classe list-mix-body é mostrado.

  • Título do item
    Legenda
    Este bloco aparece quando o botão for clicado.
  • Título do item
    Legenda
    Este bloco aparece quando o botão for clicado. 
<ul class="list-mix">
  <!-- FOR EACH LIST ITEM -->
  <li class="icon-XXX-lightgray_32_34-before">
    <div class="list-mix-item">
      <!-- ADD THE CLASS button-disabled TO THE BUTTON TO CANCEL THE DROPDOWN EFFECT -->
      <button class="button-default button-dropdown">
        <span class="icon-arrow-down-lightblue_8_10 show"></span>
      </button>
      <div class="list-mix-content">
        <div class="list-mix-header">
          <h5><a class="list-mix-title" href="ITEM_LINK" title="ITEM_NAME">ITEM_NAME</a></h5>
          <span class="legend">ITEM_LEGEND</span>
        </div>
        <div class="list-mix-body">
          TO BE DISPLAYED WHEN DROPDOWN BUTTON IS CLICKED
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </li>
  <!-- END -->
</ul>
